readable.title: 3464871350_3f2d624a9c
readable.content: A driver is sitting in a Team Penske race car . A race car driver with an orange helmet sits in a team Penske Indy car at the raceway . A race car sits in the pits . Race car driver getting ready for the start of the race . Racing car marked TEAM PENSKE on track , banners and spectators in background .
